name: EQUIPOISE
description:
OVERVIEW

This is a 2D game wherein the player is a single character walking on stilts or wobbling on a ball guiding herself to overcome the obstacles. The entire game operates on a single-button system. Using the left mouse click, the player moves his character from one place to another, exploring levels and enemies and engaging in the core gameplay concepts.

CONTROLS
  • Left Mouse Click - To move forward 
  • Hold Left Mouse Button - For more power 
TEAM

Game Designer: Tejaswini

Level Designer: Shubham Beri

Game Programmer: Ganzhong Guan (Gavin)
